thread.title: Cory Watson names new principal

author: Michael Seale
title: Cory Watson names new principal
text: Cory Watson names new principal Feb 23, 2017, 1:54pm CST Industries & Tags Michael Seale Reporter Birmingham Business Journal Share Cory Watson's newest principal, Stephen Hunt Birmingham law firm Cory Watson has named a new principal. Stephen Hunt , who has been with the firm since 2006, was named principal this week by the personal injury law firm, and will continue to practice in the areas of products liability, pharmaceutical drug litigation and medical device litigation. Enlarge Cory Watson's newest principal, Stephen Hunt He has served in leadership positions in several multi-district litigations. Most recently, he was appointed to serve on the joint discovery committee in the Abilify lawsuits from across the U.S. in federal court in Pensacola, Florida. He is also actively serving as a member of the Plaintiffs’ Steering Committee in the Zofran consolidated federal litigation. Hunt has been recognized by Super Lawyers as a Mid-­South Rising Star and has been named to National Trial Lawyers Top 40 Under 40. A graduate of the University of Alabama at Birmingham , Hunt received his law degree at Cumberland School of Law. “ Stephen Hunt has done outstanding work for our firm by representing our clients who have been harmed by dangerous drugs and defective medical devices,” said founding principal Ernest Cory . "He is a fierce advocate, and his promotion is well deserved. We are excited to welcome Stephen as a principal." Michael Seale covers the banking, finance and legal beats for the Birmingham Business Journal Industries
